nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_503
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Not until he saw his mother lying in bed, dying, did he realize how much he loved her.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_504
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Taking into account of his recent physical condition , I think he has done quite well in the exam.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_505
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Mrs. Clark lies in bed motionless, and I wonder briefly if she is still alive.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_506
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The building was darkened except for a single light burning in a third-storey window.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_507
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: These soldiers have received very strict training and are well equipped to fulfill the new task.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_508
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He reached for the phone, picked it up, and dialed the hotel's number.
